name: Notion Travel Planner
description: Never Forget Anything, Travel with Peace of Mind with Our Travel Planner.Plan your next travel, all in one place.Features:Organize your itinerary, transportation, accommodation and more Stay on top of important dates Plan and manage your travel budgetKeep track of your travel bucket list Keep all your important documents and packing lists in one placeAll features are fully customizable to meet your individual needs.What is Notion? Notion is a free all-in-one workspace that allows you to organize
features: Organize your itinerary, transportation, accommodation and more; Stay on top of important dates; Plan and manage your travel budget; Keep track of your travel bucket list; Keep all your important documents and packing lists in one place
